description: Retrieves the metadata for the specified resource share.

nested_items.name: shareId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource share.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Arn of the shared resource.

nested_items.name: resourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the shared resource.

nested_items.name: principalSubscriber
nested_items.description: The principal subscriber is the account that is sharing the resource.

nested_items.name: ownerId
nested_items.description: The account ID for the data owner. The owner creates the resource share.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for a resource share. It provides additional details about the share status.

nested_items.name: shareName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource share.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the resource share was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the resource share update.
